languages.text: "В кошмарах я бодрствую. А благословенный шепот Его сопровождает меня всю жизнь".
"All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."
languages.original_text: "В кошмарах я бодрствую. А благословенный шепот Его сопровождает меня всю жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper, it has been with me all my life."
"All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper, it has been with me all my life."

"All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."
"All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

languages.text: "Alle meine Albträume erscheinen mir, wenn ich wach bin. Und was das gesegnete Flüstern des Imperators angeht: Es begleitet mich schon mein ganzes Leben lang."
languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

traits.locale_text: "Alle meine Albträume erscheinen mir, wenn ich wach bin. Und was das gesegnete Flüstern des Imperators angeht: Es begleitet mich schon mein ganzes Leben lang."

languages.text: « Tous mes cauchemars se manifestent quand je suis éveillée. Quant à Ses murmures sacrés, ils m'ont accompagnée toute ma vie. »
languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

traits.locale_text: « Tous mes cauchemars se manifestent quand je suis éveillée. Quant à Ses murmures sacrés, ils m'ont accompagnée toute ma vie. »

languages.text: «Mis pesadillas acuden a mí mientras estoy despierta. En cuanto a Su susurro, me ha acompañado toda la vida».
languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

traits.locale_text: «Mis pesadillas acuden a mí mientras estoy despierta. En cuanto a Su susurro, me ha acompañado toda la vida».

languages.text: 「悪夢はすべて、目が覚めているときに見るものよ。主の祝福に満ちた囁きは、私の生涯を共にしたの」
languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

traits.locale_text: 「悪夢はすべて、目が覚めているときに見るものよ。主の祝福に満ちた囁きは、私の生涯を共にしたの」

languages.text: “我所有的噩梦都是在我清醒的时候浮现的。至于祂那充满祝福的低语声，我时时刻刻都能听到。”
languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

traits.locale_text: “我所有的噩梦都是在我清醒的时候浮现的。至于祂那充满祝福的低语声，我时时刻刻都能听到。”

languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."

languages.text: "Ben tüm kâbuslarımı ayıkken görürüm. O'nun kutsal fısıltısına gelirsek... Ömrüm boyunca yanımda olmuştur."
languages.original_text: "All my nightmares come to me when I am awake. As for His blessed whisper: it has been with me all my life."
